title: Extra chat features
description: The electron app developed in `src/` has an agentic chat which needs extra features. References `README.md`, `docs/FILE_ORGANISATION.md`.

features.title: LLM connector abstraction and providers (LiteLLM, OpenAI-compatible)
features.description: Design an abstraction for chat providers. Implement connectors for: (1) LiteLLM-compatible HTTP endpoint, (2) OpenAI-compatible custom base URL to support LM Studio / Ollama. Configurable API key, base URL, model name, timeouts.

features.title: Context retrieval for chat - using graphiti
features.description: There's a library `https://github.com/getzep/graphiti` that provides an upgraded RAG database. Create agentic tools for this and allow local-only retrieval.
